snippet: Everyone talks about it, but nobody does anything about the weather. A mobile social network centered around the weather seems as unlikely as one for fancy cheese. But Weathermob, a new app for the iPhone, is trying to attract people from all over...
abstract: Everyone talks about it, but nobody does anything about the weather. A mobile social network centered around the weather seems as unlikely as one for fancy cheese. But Weathermob, a new app for the iPhone, is trying to attract people from all over the world on one of the top conversational topics. A report from South by Southwest.

headline.main: WeatherMob, a Social Network Around the Local Forecast
